name: Lightweight Cube 1x1x1
notes: Swap in high areas to lower CG

name: Ballast Cube 1x1x1 (dense)
notes: For CG tuning; use low in chassis

name: Differential Block
notes: Bias torque; optional if physics supports

name: Locked Axle Block
notes: Improves traction; worse turning on high grip

name: Small Wheel 1.5x
notes: Low drag, modest grip, quick accel

name: Ice Tire (narrow)
notes: Narrow contact; better bite on low grip

name: Soft Tire (high grip)
notes: High grip; higher drag and wear

name: Hard Tire (low drag)
notes: Lower grip but durable and fast on straights

name: Winglet 1x2
notes: Yaw stability; mount aft of CG

name: Fairing 3x2
notes: Reduce snag; minor downforce when canted

name: Outrigger Beam 3x1x1
notes: Widen track; mount wheels far outboard

name: Nose Cone 2x1x1 (wedge)
notes: Helps deflect rams and reduce drag

name: Quick-Detach Cover 3x2
notes: Repair speed; yank off after damage
